Summary of Conditional PMF

Source: R/04_pmf_conditional.R
summary_pmf_K_given_alpha.Rd

Returns a comprehensive summary of the conditional distribution \(K_J \mid \alpha\).

Usage

summary_pmf_K_given_alpha(J, alpha, logS)

Arguments

J

Integer; sample size.

alpha

Numeric; DP concentration parameter.

logS

Matrix; pre-computed log-Stirling matrix.

Value

A list with components:

J

Sample size

alpha

Concentration parameter

mean

Conditional mean \(E[K_J \mid \alpha]\)

var

Conditional variance \(Var(K_J \mid \alpha)\)

sd

Conditional standard deviation

mode

Most likely value of K

median

Median of K

quantiles

25th, 50th, and 75th percentiles

pmf

Full PMF vector

cdf

Full CDF vector

Examples

logS <- compute_log_stirling(50)
summary <- summary_pmf_K_given_alpha(50, 2.0, logS)
print(summary)
#> $J
#> [1] 50
#> 
#> $alpha
#> [1] 2
#> 
#> $mean
#> [1] 7.037626
#> 
#> $var
#> [1] 4.535558
#> 
#> $sd
#> [1] 2.129685
#> 
#> $mode
#> [1] 7
#> 
#> $median
#> [1] 7
#> 
#> $quantiles
#> q25 q50 q75 
#>   6   7   8 
#> 
#> $pmf
#>  [1] 0.000000e+00 7.843137e-04 7.026204e-03 2.892321e-02 7.366141e-02
